(Woah, totally absent for two days or so.  Sorry, I've had a long 'battle' 
with my brother with control of the internet, and it's come down that I had 
to pull out the ol' schedule card.  So I will be on more than usual.  As 
school work permits me, that is.  Aren't you all just so lucky?  Also, 
football ends on the 25th, and I'll be getting home two hours earlier, so 
I'll be on EVEN more.  Lovely, just lovely)


Oblitertron/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh Ripper/Serpentor/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Chaos/Minion/Sixshot/Ares/Unitron:



Oblitertron let out a roar of anger as he saw Mobster disassemble into small 
parts.  "COWARD!" he bellowed, firing off three optic blasts solely at 
Grenade. He would crush these pathetic ants, one by one.  No matter how long 
it took.  The behemoth burst out into laughter as autogun fire stung into his 
back.  

---

Demon Wulf looked at the battle, his blade at the ready.  "Brothers, we have 
remained idle enough.  CRUSH THEM!" he howled, firing off three optic blasts 
at Jestorm, a burst of flames emitting from his open mouth, heading for 
Jetstorm.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off three bolts from his rifle at Sharpedge.

---

Dark Claw, still in his "vehicle" mode, firing off two missiles, one from 
each missile launcher installed in his vehicle mode, at the Mafia base.

---

Chaos fired off ten rapid optic blasts at the Mafia base.

---

Minion fired took out his automatic rifle, firing off twenty-five explosive 
shells at the Mafia base.

---

Unitron, still in tank mode, targeted with his cannon, firing off a single 
blast at Kracken.

---

Sixshot gained altitude, getting a target lock, and firing off two seeking 
missiles down at Gigas.

---

Ares transformed to tank mode, firing off three laser blasts from all four of 
his cannons, a total of sixteen shots lancing out at Sharpedge.
========

Serpentor looked at the Alliance bot who had told him to join the battle.  
"Fine." he said, rubbing his mech-fluid soaked face from the shrapnel of the 
exploding Diskus.  He ran off for the Mafia base.

"We're to injured." Scattershot said, taking out a charge and setting it in 
the middle of the pieces of Diskus, the bomb set for 20 seconds.

Nemesis Enforcer and Scattershot entered the Alliance base as the bomb 
exploded, no flames or burning pieces of metal coming near the base.
